title: EtchASketch
description: Simple drawing app. Stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

title: Price app
description: React application, which displays data from JSON file (database). Search, filtering and adding to cart logic is implemented on the frontend. Stack: React, TypeScript, Bootstrap

title: Fake Store
description: E-commerse site. FakeStoreApi used as main API. Redux Toolkit used for liked items and cart

title: Ecommerce site backend + file gen
description: Django application, which gives API for frontend by Django REST framework. Also, this application can create XLSX file by data from frontend. In main branch dockerized version, also on docker version on other branch
